about_the_game:
Gods Must Work 

Take on the role of a minor deity in this turn-based city-builder with a natural twist!

Design Planets for Deitech™ Clients

As a fledgling god, you are contracted by the mighty Deitech™ Corporation to create custom planets that meet their client's exact specifications. From lush forests to bustling metropoles, the cosmos is your canvas.

Uncover the Secrets of Nature

Experiment with diverse plant and animal species to discover hidden synergies and forge powerful ecosystems. Balance thriving biodiversity with the demands of human civilization as you breathe life into your creations.

Build Cities, Beat the Clock

When humanity arrives, assist in their rapid expansion by managing timed construction projects. Can you meet their ambitious deadlines while preserving harmony across your planet?

Key Features:

Planetary Sandbox: Shape terrain, sculpt ecosystems, and design unique planets.
Species Synergy: Experiment with lifeforms to unlock powerful hidden abilities and create ecological wonders.
Strategic City Building: Help humans build sprawling cities without disrupting the delicate balance of nature.
Deitech™ Challenges: Tackle demanding contracts with unique goals and time limits.
Total Control: Fully assume the role of grand creator by adding your own species, projects, and levels through scripting with mod support.

Are You Ready to Prove That Gods Must Work?

With the universe as your playground, it’s time to wield divine power and show Deitech™ you have what it takes to create thriving worlds.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Dual-core processor, 2.4 GHz or higher (e.g., Intel Core i3-4160 or AMD equivalent)
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any DirectX-compatible sound card
  • VR Support: Not supported
  • Additional Notes: These specifications are subject to change as the game is optimized further during development.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Gods Must Work is a turn-based city-builder about designing planets. Shape ecosystems, experiment with species for powerful synergies, and help humanity build thriving cities while balancing nature’s delicate harmony. Can you meet the demands of Deitech's™ cosmic clients?
